translation: BHAGVATI STANZA. UTTERED WITH THY GRACE

gurmukhi: ik, AwiC`j dysY ] ik, AwiB`j BysY ]
transliteration: Ki Aachhijj Desai|| Ki Aabhijj Bhesai||
translation: That thy Abode is unconquerable. That Thy Garb is unimpaired.

gurmukhi: ik, AwgMj krmY ] ik, AwBMj BrmY ]103]
transliteration: Ki Aagadj Karmai|| Ki Aabhanj Bharmai||103||
translation: That Thou art beyond impact of Karmas. That Thou art free from doubts.103.

gurmukhi: ik, AwiB`j lokY ] ik, Awid`q sokY ]
transliteration: Ki Aabhijj Lokai|| Ki Aaditt Sokai||
translation: That Thy abode is unimpaired. That thy canst dry up the sun.

gurmukhi: ik, AvDUq brnY ] ik, ibBUq krnY ]104]
transliteration: Ki Avdhoot Barnai|| Ki Bibhoot Karnai||104||
translation: That Thy demeanour is saintly. That thou art the Source of wealth.104.

gurmukhi: ik, rwjM pRBw hYN ] ik, DrmM Dujw hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Raajan Prabhaa Hain|| Ki Dharman Dhujaa Hain||
translation: That Thou art the glory of kingdom. That Thou art eh ensign of righteousness.

gurmukhi: ik, Awsok brnY ] ik, srbw ABrnY ]105]
transliteration: Ki Aasok Barnai|| Ki Sarbaa Abharnai||105||
translation: That Thou hast no worries. That Thou art the ornamentation of all.105.

gurmukhi: ik, jgqM ik®qI hYN ] ik CqRM, CqRI hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Jagadan Kritoo Hain|| Ki Chhatran Chhatroo Hain||
translation: That Thou art the Creator of the universe. That Thou art the Bravest of the Brave.

gurmukhi: ik, bRhmM srUpY ] ik, AnBau AnUpY ]106]
transliteration: Ki Brahman Daroopai|| Ki Anbhau Aboopai||106||
translation: That Thou art All-Pervading Entity. That Thou art the Source of Divine Knowledge.106.

gurmukhi: ik, Awid Adyv hYN ] ik, Awip AByv hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Aadh Adev Hain|| Ki Aap(i) Abhev Hain||
translation: That Thou art the Primal Entity without a Master. That Thou art self-illumined.

gurmukhi: ik, icqRM ibhInY ] ik, eykY ADInY ]107]
transliteration: Ki Chittran Bihoonai|| Ki Ekai Adhoonai||107||
translation: That Thou art without any portrait. That Thou art Master of Thyself.107.
That Thou art the Sustainer and Generous. That Thou art the Re-deemer and Pure.

gurmukhi: ik, pwk ibAYb hYN ] ik, gYbul gYb hYN ]108]
transliteration: Ki Paak Be-aib Hain|| Ki Gadbul Ghaib Hain||108||
translation: That Thou art Flawless. That Thou art most Mysterious.108.

gurmukhi: ik, APvul gunwh hYN ] ik, swhwn swh hYN ]
transliteration: Ki Afvul Gounaah Hain|| Ki Shaahaan Shaah Hain||
translation: That Thou forgivest sins. That Thou art the Emperor of Emperors.
